name: The Epic Adventure For Coffee
description:
I'm sorry tea drinkers this game is not for you. For those of you who aren't there are 7 endings in total, congrats to anyone who has witnessed all of them. If you need help with one of them ask me in the comments and I can help you.

Story

Your wife has made a horrible cup of coffee of course it's impossible to work without having a decent cup of coffee first. Now go find that coffee (or don't).

Endings

-Bad Ending

-Mediocre Ending

-Criminal Ending

-Lazy Ending

-True Ending

-Secret Ending

-Cursed Ending
